song.title: My God, I abandon
song.lyrics:
[V1] My God, I abandon my life into your hands. Do with me only what You will. Iâ€™m ready for all. I accept all things. Do what You will, Lord, with my thanks.
[C] For You are my Father, my life is in your hands. For You are my Father, I put my trust in You.
[V2] My God, I entrust everything I have to You, In your hands I place my soul. With all my heart I offer it to You, I have one desire, Your will be done.
